content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 2.41 - Storage of cleaned containers and equipment-item 13p

State Regulations
(a) All multiuse containers, equipment and
utensils, after cleaning, shall be transported and/or stored on racks or in
clean cases elevated above the floor. Containers shall be stored inverted on
racks or in cases constructed of relatively non-absorbent, corrosion-resistant, non-toxic materials, or otherwise protected from contamination. All portable
equipment with food-contact surfaces, and all utensils, that have been cleaned
and sanitized shall be stored in a location and manner that protects
food-contact surfaces from allergen cross-contact and from
contamination. (b) Floors are not
flushed or washed when crates of clean bottles are stacked on them. Notes
